1.name: 'Debugging a legacy program'
1.description: 'The aim is to find bugs in a legacy program and fix them, but keep original structure of program. The user should write own tests to find the bugs and fix them'

1.name: 'Adding new features to the legacy program'
1.description: 'The aim is to add some new features to the legacy program'

1.name: 'Refactoring the legacy program'
1.description: 'The aim is to refactor the content of the legacy program with keeping its functionality'
